## scriptcli daemon start

Run the thatacli daemon

### Synopsis

Run the thatacli daemon.

```
scriptcli daemon start [flags]
```

### Examples

```
scriptcli daemon start --port=10002
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for start
      --port string   Port to run the ScriptCli Daemon (default "10002")
```
